item.description: Maine sued the Trump administration on Monday for freezing federal funds to the state after it refused to ban men in women’s sports. Maine also lied i...

item.title: SCOTUS Ruling In Deportation Case Is Too Little Too Late
item.description: The court could've reigned in the judicial supremacy sooner -- but Roberts, Barrett, and three other justices squandered it.

item.title: Kansas Republicans Plan Veto Override To Protect Adopting Families From Religious Discrimination
item.description: Kansas House Speaker Dan Hawkins and Senate President Ty Masterson promised that Kelly's 'veto cannot stand.'

item.title: Colorado Democrats ‘Silence’ State GOP To Push Genital Mutilation And Taxpayer-Funded Abortion
item.description: Colorado Democrats want to kill as many babies and mutilate as many children as possible, and make Coloradans pay for it.
